entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
